example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (DNP (NP (QP (OD 十九)) (NP (NN 世纪))) (DEG 的)) (ADJP (JJ 制冰)) (NP (NN 业者))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 派) (NP-OBJ (NN 人)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (UCP (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 结冰))) (DEC 的))) (UCP (NP (NN 湖面)) (CC 或) (LCP (NP (NN 河)) (LC 里))))) (PU ，) (VP (BA 将) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (NN 冰块)) (VP (VP (VV 锯下)) (VP (PP-BNF (P 给) (NP (NN 顾客))) (VP (VV 使用))))))))))
